item.title: Fifth Head of Cerberus
item.description: The Fifth Head of Cerberus is three novellas Frankenstein-ed together, it lacks the cohesiveness that Wolfe’s Book of the New Sun has. It feels like a prototype of what Gene Wolfe would go on to write.

item.title: Sword & Citadel - The Second Half Of The Book Of The New Sun
item.description:
A fantastic conclusion to the Book of the New Sun. Do not skip this one, it’s cool, it’s funny, it’s wacky, it’s begging to be read multiple times.

If you’ve got the right group, this would make for a great book club book.

item.title: Shadow & Claw - The First Half Of The Book Of The New Sun
item.description: Shadow & Claw is an omnibus containing the first half of Gene Wolfe’s Book of the New Sun which is a far future sci-fi fantasy epic following the story of Severian the torturer, a self described insane person who has trouble differentiating between reality, his memories and his dreams.
